name: map
signature: { <A, B>(f: (a: A) => B): <E, R>(self: Stream<A, E, R>) => Stream<B, E, R>; <A, E, R, B>(self: Stream<A, E, R>, f: (a: A) => B): Stream<B, E, R>; }
description: Transforms the elements of this stream using the supplied function.
